metadata.title: CVE-2015-6638 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Imagination Technologies driver in Android 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY49F and6.0 before 2016-01-01 allows attackers to gain privileges via a craftedapplication, aka internal bug 24673908.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
